value.title: Add/Append rows and columns to tables without merging using M in power query
value.excerpt: In this video, I am going to show you how to add column and rows to a table in power query without appending it. Simply using the M language. #powerquery #curbal #powerbi   Here you can download all the pbix file (download 49- community downloads): https://curbal.com/donwload-center  SUBSCRIBE to learn

value.title: Advanced Concatenate/ Merge columns with Power Query
value.excerpt: Concatenating columns in Power Query is not hard to do, but depending on the technique you use, you might get unexpected or wrong results.  There is a bullet proof way to do it and I will explain it here.  00:00 Intro & Problem description 01:19 How power query concatenates columns with Table.CombineColumns

value.title: Enable QUERY FOLDING for native queries in Power Query / Power BI

value.title: Power BI parameters - Updating in the Power BI Service or with APIs
value.excerpt: In this video, Adam looks at how you can update Power BI parameters within the service or by using APIs. You can create Power BI Parameters within Power BI Desktop using Power Query. Then you can update those Power BI parameters once the report is published to the Power BI service.  PowerShell Samples:
